titles.title: Entrepreneurs' Research Incentive Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the research credit available to certain start-up ventures.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/22/1988--Introduced. Entrepreneurs' Research Incentive Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to apply the research tax credit to in-house research expenses that the taxpayer pays or incurs for the principal purpose of using the research results in the active conduct of a future trade or business.
